ygData.subject: Re: Trade Skills
ygData.msgSnippet: Nope they sure arent, you can max out if you actually have the cash.... as if that will happen anytime soon, especially with smithy. Azekiel, Paladin of the
ygData.messageBody:
Nope they sure arent, you can max out if you actually have the cash.... as if that
will happen anytime soon, especially with smithy.
Azekiel, Paladin of the 13th level
